description:
Ok, I don't want to offend Alek, but I think he has kind of a sexy geek thing going on.
A friend referred me to him, and I was taken by his brainiac charm, and the fact that he is a bit of a nudist and a very sexual guy, wrapped up in a "square" package...yum!
He is not shy about showing off his ass either and I think he NEEDS to have his butt eaten out big time.
We will see if he will do more. He seemed on the fence about getting a blow job, and I kind of wanted to know if you all liked his Geek Next Door Look. There is a little sugar to him, so he's one of the 'straight' ones that sets my gaydar off.
He actually has a hot 'lil bod on him, and his personality really is kind of sparkling.
What ya think?
title: Alek - Solo
